OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_SCOPE.description: The scope of the connector, e.g. 'flashpoint'.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

CONNECTOR_AUTO.description: Whether the connector should run automatically when an entity is created or updated.

SHODAN_MAX_TLP.description: The maximal TLP of the observable being enriched.

SHODAN_DEFAULT_SCORE.description: Default_score allows you to add a default score for an indicator and its observable

SHODAN_IMPORT_SEARCH_RESULTS.description: Returns the results of the search against the enriched indicator (Search the SHODAN database).

SHODAN_CREATE_NOTE.description: Adds Shodan results to a note, otherwise it is saved in the description.

SHODAN_USE_ISP_NAME_FOR_ASN.description: Use the ISP name for ASN name rather than AS+Number.
